None.Name: Gifted Feminism
None.Description: Strengthens the power of women; the targeted female, friendly unit will deal 35% more damage against male units and evaporate a poison that additionally makes every male, hostile unit within a 15m radius lose 15 life points per second. Can only be cast on females. Lasts for 15 seconds. Reusable every 20 seconds.
